## About me

Hello! 👋 I’m **Partha Sai Guttikonda**, a Full-Stack Engineer and Researcher with experience in **machine learning**, **high-performance computing**, and **software development**. 🎓 I hold a Master's degree in **Computer Science** from the University of Texas at Arlington. I’ve worked on **building scalable web applications**, **managing microservices**, and applying **AI** to solve complex problems. 🔧 My projects focus on improving **diagnostic tools**, optimizing **infrastructure**, and automating **workflows**. 🌟 Feel free to explore my work and see how I’ve contributed to **medical imaging**, **cloud computing**, and **backend systems**. I’m excited to collaborate and create impactful solutions! 🌐✨
